title: Did We Just See 'The Turn'?
text:
Mark your calendarsThe long road that saw most technology and other growth stocks far outperform more mundane issues may have finally come to an endMonday saw an almost uncanny distribution of returnThe 50-best performing S&P 500 stocks year-to-date going into the day were down an average of 1.45%. The 50-worst performing stocks going into Monday ...
